about_the_game:
In the demo, a part of the first map is available to you.
You will get access to a small part of the punch forms to get an insight into the combat system.

This demo does not represent the main story.

content_descriptors.notes:
There will be battle scenes led against machines and artificially created biomass. 
No living creatures will be killed, only machines and artificially created biomass will be destroyed, respect for life is an important part of the main story.
